column4: i need help with networking. i already have some shares on a windows network and can access them just fine from the file manager, but when i am in an application trying to open or save a document i dont know how to open or save from a network location
smb://monsterplatinum/Users    is the location i will be using most
thats all i know of where it is
you check the output of "mount". Or pastebin it and we'll have a look together :)
